name: Farty Bird: New Adventure
description:
You know what time it is. ...It’s Flappy Time and this time he brought his friends along! Flappy Time is the best clone out there and now has three game modes: easy, medium, and hard. Collect coins while flapping through the levels but watch out for the fire-breathing monster! If you time your jump just right you can land on the fireball and slip into ghost mode for 10 seconds, allowing you to fly THROUGH the tunnels while collecting FREE coins! If you ever get stuck just use a 1Up. See where your Game Center friends died as you pass their high score.

Flappy Time! is not affiliated with Gear Studios or the original Flappy Bird in any way.
